alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:01PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nueces and northern Kleberg Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 401 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bishop, or 7 miles west of Driscoll, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Driscoll and Bishop. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 678 and 684. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
